protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-501
text: raw data (Affy .CEL files) were quantile normalized, background corrected and transformed into expression estimates by gcRMA implemented in R. All settings were standard and all files were included in a single transformation. In the resulting text output file the Affy identifiers were mapped to AGI codes using the TIGR 4.0 release.
NOTE: expression estimates generated by gcRMA are log2 (log base 2) !

protocol.name: P-MTAB-502
text: Total RNA extraction using Qiagen RNeasy Plant Mini Kit

protocol.name: P-MTAB-503
text: Initial stratification for 2 days at 4 degrees
Plants were grown on soil under continuous light at  23°C
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, min temperature = 23, temperature unit = C, media = soil). Flowers were harvested on stage 10-12, and apex  SAM and flowers to stage 9.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-504
protocol.text: Tissue of 20 dissected apices was pooled for RNA extraction
